akn:subsection.akn:heading: Relationship to other departments and agencies

akn:content.akn:p: (h) Relationship to other departments and agencies The authority of the Directing Officer of the NBIC under this section shall not affect any authority or responsibility of any other department or agency of the Federal Government with respect to biosurveillance activities under any program administered by that department or agency.
(i) Authorization of appropriations There are authorized to be appropriated such sums as are necessary to carry out this section.
